description: Touring made easy. This sturdy kayak brings a full feature-set to a comfortable and versatile design. With a skeg plus the option of a rudder, you get added control for flat, moving or ocean use.Stable hull design made of durable roto-moulded plastic, with drop down skeg.Foam sealed bulkhead at the stern.Oversized sit-inside cockpit, with adjustable thigh braces.Full sized seat, with adjustable high back rest.Deck bungees.Stern hatch.Optional rudder (sold separately).Removable skid plate.
name: Feelfree Aventura 110 Skeg Kayak
